author: Stavros Pavlidis
comment: Please add the option to change the font on the At a glance widget. The reason why I chose to use Chronus's one instead of the built in into the launcher is because it was sticking to good old Roboto instead of the atrocity that Product Sans is.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: You can configure almost all the components of the widgets to make them look any way you want.  All popups and dialogs are fully material design, widget layouts etc are for the most part as well.

author: Jerrod Talley
comment: I paid for pro a long time ago and now  when i go to change something and it says I need pro. It wants to charge me again.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please contact us at chronus.widget@gmail.com for instructions on how to restore your license. Don't worry, it is safe.

author: Shane Plant-Mason
comment: Please add an option for the forecast to show the upcoming forecast and not current conditions when sized down

author: Jimmy Boy
comment: Must have. Great all around widget

author: Madison Camp
comment: I got this app for the widget, so it suits my purposes. I like the weather widget and the moon cycles. However, the weather is honestly super unreliable. Usually it is about 10° off from the local weather station (which is generally accurate). Today the app said it was 73° outside when it was actually 50°. I don't recommend you rely on this app for weather.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Try different weather providers.  Chronus itself is not a weather service, we only display the weather data from the selected provider.

author: Michal Skukalek
comment: The only thing that updates on the damn widget is clock. 1 star until fixed

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please contact us at chronus.widget@gmail.com with details of your problem so we can help

author: Harsimran Singh
comment: Where have been this widget trying many different widgets but this is really nice clean minimal & stock 👍🏽👌🏽

author: Vineet Kumar
comment: Given font with contrasting outline, it'll be helpful.

author: Drasko Divic
comment: Very good!

author: Laurent Bon
comment: I bought the Pro version of this app to try and replace my beloved Dashclock widget. The implementation is nice but the widgets are only updating the time. Everything else stays the same as when I created the widget. I mostly use Dash notifier extension that is apparently supported by Chronus to monitor notifications such as Spotify playing & whasapp incoming. On Chronus, they never update.. Am I missing something??

author: Ronnie Carroll
comment: This app has a few very nice and actually useful widgets that I have come to use daily. These widgets are indeed lightweight for any android launcher and run without incident! The Clock Widget is among the top of the lightweight widgets you can get on the Play Store. The News Widget 'Once Set Up With Your Feedly Account' is really hard to beat! I have to give this app 5 stars hands down!

Nice idea but poor implementation. Far too easy to hit clock instead of settings icon, especially when widget is maximised. If clock is not displayed, settings icon is missing. The clock doesn't align with those of Dashclock and Better Dashclock on my other desktops. Ugly alignment of widgets (especially Dashclock widgets);which are far too close to each other, in both Dash and Flex. The Flex widget is ironically inflexible, with the order of elements fixed and, furthermore, the rss ticker forces Dashclock widgets into a single row above it that cannot be scrolled either - so I can't even expand the fourth one,  even if my child's fingers *weren't* too fat to launch one. Doesn't find all the Dashclock widgets I have installed. Last, and most significantly, you can't rate the demo version. If these issues (starting with the Flex widget and the rss issue) are fixedI'll consider rating it higher - as it is though, I'll have to stick with my current arrangement.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Thank you for trying Chronus and your feedback. Unfortunately we cannot satisfy all users.

author: Zaros105
comment: Screenshots misleading. All the nice features require purchases.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: The Play store listing very clearly states which features are Standard and which ones are pro.

author: Rob Dupuis
comment: Great widgets. Works well. Looks good and modern. Caution: sometimes it doesn't update right away once you've changed settings.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: No,  the Pixel2's widget's date goes away when there is an  at a glance event showing.  Our widget works exactly the same.

author: Jerry
comment: Decent app. Needs a couple of more fonts / styles for widgets. Dev's don't respond. Would be rated higher with a response.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please send us an email again. I may have missed it, or post a message in our Google+ group. I try our best to be responsive.

author: George Rojas
comment: Great calendar widget. The widget displays events up to 2 weeks in advance. So you always know what's on your calendar.

author: Guilherme Souza
comment: Just refreshing my rating, almost 4 years later still the best weather app

author: Akshay Gaikwad
comment: Please add an option to center the text in the widgets!

author: A. Lee
comment: An excellent weather clock.

author: Devyn T
comment: Best app ever made

author: Gérson M.
comment: Notification message count no longer works on Ticwatch E.  Reply to Dev: I tried the newest version and still does not show notification counter (other watch faces work just fine)

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please try the latest version and let me know if it works better

comment: Lost Pro features

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Not to worry, your license is safe. Send an email to the support mailbox (chronus.widget@gmail.com) for the steps to restore your license.

author: parash poudel
comment: Beautiful

author: Lawrence Elliott
comment: Looks great in the store, but is difficult to set up and customize. Widgets don't work or have to be reset repeatedly. I even bought the paid version. Very disappointed.

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please contact us via the Contact technical support button in the Help and support section of the app with details of the problem (device, android version, launcher app, what widget, how it is configured etc.) so we can help.

author: Colin Hansen
comment: Great app, planing on buying the pro version due to limited features in free version

author: MK K
comment: Awesome best weather and clock wedget ever

author: James Saquilabon
comment: Please don't be greedy.

author: Aditya Patel
comment: One of the beat weather app in the market. It works like charm on my moto360. Very pleasant looking icons and UI. 5 stars from my side.

comment: Every time there's an update i lose the pro features..

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Not to worry, your license is safe. Send an email to the support mailbox (chronus.widget@gmail.com) for the steps to restore your license.

author: Matthias Braeuer
comment: Great widgets. Unfortunately, I'm having some issues activating Pro features on my new Huawei device (Error message that Play Store is not installed even though it is).

author: Saimir Ruci
comment: this is my favourite watch face

author: Jeff R
comment: Great looking widgets with tons of options.  Setup a pixel2 type time/weather widget to link date to Nine calendar and weather icon to Rainbreak weather. Was having a few issues but the latest update seems like it may have fixed them. Thanks!

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please contact us via the support email so we can work with you to figure out the problem and fix it.

author: Pratish Nair
comment: I have purchased the full version of this app... The Clock + Weather widget does not update the weather status automatically... I had to manually update the widget after I waited up to1 day for it to automatically update... Looks like it was a waste of money

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: Please ensure that you disable battery optimization for Chronus in Android settings, Apps, Chronus, power or battery. Your android OS is killing the background update services.

comment: I love it and have been using it for years now. But now I got a S8 and set the raster to 5x10 and the widget doesn't adapt anymore when resizing and stays pretty small :/ makes me sad

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: You can increase the font via the font size sliders

author: bibi kola
comment: Change my phone and installed Chronus and I get an infected phone with malware popping up every time the screen changes. Chronus seems to be a headache you get when you least need it. Wish I could get my refund

reply.author: DvTonder
reply.content: What you are seeing is not from Chronus. Either it is accuweather showing crap in their forecast data or your device has been compromised but something else. It is NOT from Chronus.

author: Laziz Rashidov
comment: Hey! I really like your application, this widget is amazing! Like it. Useful and simple, but need more customization options for widgets. That's why I put 4 stars

comment: It's a good app and widget just needs a feels like temperature on d widget

author: Michael Markowitz
comment: Attractive, well-designed widgets that are easy to configure. Developer was super-responsive when I had a problem. Very happy with my purchase.

comment: The best weather app on the app store . Well done to the developers.   Thank you.
